entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: It took some doing but Barrezz's slicer was able to shift through the data and locate the item that both the Rebels and Empire have been searching for. Its a droid that was sold to a merchant named Watto, who lives in Mos Espa. Barrezz is sending you up to Watto to retrieve this droid.
entries.journal_entry_description: You have gotten Commander Barrezz his inventory of everything that was in the shipment. He now wants you to take the data to his slicer.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Good job on getting the complete inventory. You need it get it to my slicer. But he is freelancing for some criminals. You need get to him, using any means necessary.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Barrezz's slicer needs some rescuing from his current employers, a group of criminals near the Darklighter Estate.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: I have received Lavar's transmission. You have done a great service for the Empire. I need you to retrieve that droid from this Watto.
